frontmatter.title: Plymouth Heights CRC Survey Analysis
frontmatter.subtitle: Congregational Survey Results for Pastoral Search

children.value: Comprehensive analysis of 68 congregational survey responses to guide the pastoral search process.

This analysis provides data-driven insights from the Plymouth Heights Christian Reformed Church congregation to inform the completion of the church profile form and guide the pastoral search committee.
5-minute orientation to all documents and how to use them effectively.
Key findings, statistics, and bottom-line recommendations for the search committee.
50-page comprehensive analysis with 150+ quotes, detailed findings, and recommendations.
Section-by-section guidance for filling out the official church profile form.
What You Need in a Pastor

children.label: What You Need in a Pastor

children.value: 5 statistical charts (attendance, scales, participation, strengths, challenges)
11 word clouds (worship, pastor qualities, priorities, identity, future goals)

All reports are available in multiple formats:

Plymouth Heights is a theologically grounded, missionally engaged, worship-centered congregation
Committed members, excellent programs, community presence
Youth retention and next generation engagement
Unity amid denominational tensions, staff dynamics
Exceptional preacher who is relational, committed long-term, and can lead renewal
The right pastor can lead this church into a thriving new season. The congregation has spoken clearly about what they need.

This analysis was conducted using quantitative statistical methods and qualitative text analysis on 68 survey responses. All statistics and quotes are drawn directly from the survey data. The analysis provides the congregation‚Äôs voice - combine it with leadership wisdom and prayer as you seek God‚Äôs chosen shepherd for Plymouth Heights CRC.
